channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NBA star Jrue Holiday lists Newton, Mass., luxury mansion for $6.9 million
item.description: Jrue Holiday is wasting no time cutting ties to the Boston Celtics, listing his home just months after being traded to the Portland Trail Blazers.

item.title: 5 spooky-good historic towns to visit for a seasonal getaway
item.description: Curate some fall vibes to truly enjoy the chillier months—check out these cities rich in history for an eerily cool weekend.

item.title: A global ‘polycrisis’ is looming, sparked by China, Taiwan and AI, say these researchers
item.description: TSMC’s advanced semiconductors are the crux of a brewing crisis, says this intelligence firm.

item.title: Lionel Messi commits to life in Miami—with purchase of 4 luxury multimillion-dollar condos
item.description: Just a few months before signing his Inter Miami contract extension, the soccer star snapped up 4 units in a luxury Miami high-rise.

item.title: This hedge-fund giant studied over 30 bubbles — and came away more convinced that the AI trade is the right one
item.description: Hedge-fund giant Coatue has heard all the bubble arguments — and still comes away convinced that the right move is betting on artificial intelligence ...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
